subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: David Kahn fired Kevin McHale, traded two starters and drafted the Spanish standout Ricky Rubio, who may never play for the Timberwolves. And he was just getting started.
snippet: David Kahn fired Kevin McHale, traded two starters and drafted the Spanish standout Ricky Rubio, who may never play for the Timberwolves. And he was just getting started.
